title: Defense Of The Town [Action, Eng, 2018]
description:
You and a group of soldiers are defending a small town on the ground. This is a difficult mission, very important for the Earth and humanity, because this is the last town in which scientists must develop weapons for the destruction of an aline space ship in orbit. In the town you need to destroy storm troopers and robots and stay alive. Cover your comrades and you will quickly reach the goal. Remember, the future of the Earth is in your hands.

Control keys:

WASD - Character Movement
SPACEBAR - Jump
SHIFT - Sprint
1,2,3,4,5 ...- Weapon change
R - Reload
Esc - Exit the menu
LMB - Shoot
RMB - Aim

System:

ОС: Windows 7 +
CPU: 2 GHz
RAM: 512 мmb
VRAM: 256 mb
HDD: 566 mb
